title: Nor Gold
description: "Nor Gold" continues The Pirate Captain, The Chronicles of a Legend "book series", volume #2 and picks up the next day where The Pirate Captain Chronicles of a Legend leaves off, with Cate Mackenzie, a woman who has lost everything to the Jacobite Uprising and is forced to sail with pirates; she is still searching for what she desires above all else: a place to belong. While Pirate Captain Nathanael Blackthorne of the Ciara Morganse finds that his past is catching up with him and is embroiled in a quest of revenge, he goes from playing guardian angel to an avenging one. Thomas, Captain of the pirate ship the Griselle must choose between a best friend or his best hope for happiness. This is a story of what two perhaps three people will do to hold on to and keep their treasure.
author: Kerry Lynne
